faqItems.q1: How do I reset my password?
faqItems.a1: Navigate to Settings → Password tab and click "Change Password" to reset your password securely.
faqItems.q2: What payment methods do you accept?
faqItems.a2: We accept credit/debit cards, bank transfers, and mobile payment options for premium subscriptions.
faqItems.q3: How can I track my learning progress?
faqItems.a3: Your dashboard displays comprehensive statistics including completed quizzes, average scores, and time spent learning.
faqItems.a4: Yes, we offer a 7-day money-back guarantee for premium subscriptions. Contact support for assistance.
